WorkPlace.OrganizationDescription: Dedicated to the energy sector, Semco Maritime is an international contracting and engineering company. For more than 30 years we have been facilitating design, fabrication, service and maintenance of our customers’ assets, providing comprehensive project management across all phases of energy projects. JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Pipefitters and Welders for Offshore, Denmark
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Your position
We are looking for pipefitters and welders for offshore work in the Danish sector with expected start in April 2022. Throughout the year we will be adding more people to our roster.

Qualifications
To be successful in this position we expect that you:

  • Are an educated and trained welder
  • Have experience with welding TIG (141), tubular cored metal arc welding (136), super duplex (141)
  • Can pass site tests before startup
  • Preferably have offshore experience
  • Are responsible
  • Have good collaboration skills
  • Have a safety-first mindset

Welcome to Semco Maritime
We offer you an interesting and challenging job in an international organization, where we strive to provide innovative and sustainable solutions globally.
There are opportunities for personal and professional development within the job. Furthermore, Semco Maritime is in growth so there are job opportunities for permanent employment.

If you would like to become a part of our excellent team, we would like to hear from you. We invite candidates for interviews on a steady basis, so send us your application as soon as possible via the ‘Apply’ link. 
If you have any questions for the position, contact Stine Jessen at +45 79 16 66 66.

See the vacancy and apply online as soon as possible:

https://semcomaritime.career.emply.com/ad/pipefitters-and-welders-for-offshore/q4w8ya/en

We look forward to hearing from you!

 

Semco Maritime is an international engineering and contracting company dedicated to projects in the energy sector. For 40 years, we have been facilitating design, fabrication, service and maintenance of our customers’ assets, providing comprehensive project management across all phases of energy projects. From turnkey engineering solutions to outsourcing of manpower and delivery of components, systems and solutions – we make sure our customers and partners in the energy sector experience safe and cost-efficient solutions. Semco Maritime has approx. 1,700 employees and branches in Denmark, Norway, United Kingdom, Germany, Singapore and the US.

For further information, please see www.semcomaritime.com
